Package com.kneelawk.knet.api.channel.context

Class CastPlayChannelContext<FROM,TO>

java.lang.Object
com.kneelawk.knet.api.channel.context.CastPlayChannelContext<FROM,TO>
Type Parameters:
FROM - the parent to cast from.
TO - the child to cast into.
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlayChannelContext<TO>
public class CastPlayChannelContext<FROM,TO> extends Object implements PlayChannelContext<TO>
Creates a channel context that casts the parent into the child.
